trans-unit.source: Adds a set of columns from one dataset to another
trans-unit.target: Adds a set of columns from one dataset to another

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Add Columns</ui> module to concatenate two datasets.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Add Columns</ui> module to concatenate two datasets.

trans-unit.source: You combine all columns from the two datasets that you specify as inputs to create a single dataset.
trans-unit.target: You combine all columns from the two datasets that you specify as inputs to create a single dataset.

trans-unit.source: If you need to concatenate more than two datasets, use several instances of <ui>Add Columns</ui>.
trans-unit.target: If you need to concatenate more than two datasets, use several instances of <ui>Add Columns</ui>.

trans-unit.source: When combining two datasets that contain a different number of rows, use the <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">M_Join</link> module, which supports outer joins on a common key column.
trans-unit.target: When combining two datasets that contain a different number of rows, use the <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">M_Join</link> module, which supports outer joins on a common key column.

trans-unit.source: Connect the datasets that you want to concatenate.
trans-unit.target: Connect the datasets that you want to concatenate.

trans-unit.source: The columns in each dataset must have an equivalent number of rows.
trans-unit.target: The columns in each dataset must have an equivalent number of rows.

trans-unit.source: You cannot choose individual columns to add.
trans-unit.target: You cannot choose individual columns to add.

trans-unit.source: All the columns from each dataset are concatenated when you use <ui>Add Columns</ui>.
trans-unit.target: All the columns from each dataset are concatenated when you use <ui>Add Columns</ui>.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you want to add only a subset of the columns, use <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project Columns</link> to create a dataset with the columns you want.
trans-unit.target: Therefore, if you want to add only a subset of the columns, use <link xlink:href="1ec722fa-b623-4e26-a44e-a50c6d726223" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Project Columns</link> to create a dataset with the columns you want.

trans-unit.source: You can right-click the output of <ui>Add Columns</ui> and select <ui>View Results</ui> to see the first rows of the new dataset, or you can select <ui>Save as Dataset</ui> to save and name the concatenated dataset.
trans-unit.target: You can right-click the output of <ui>Add Columns</ui> and select <ui>View Results</ui> to see the first rows of the new dataset, or you can select <ui>Save as Dataset</ui> to save and name the concatenated dataset.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the new dataset equals the sum of the columns of both input datasets.
trans-unit.target: The number of columns in the new dataset equals the sum of the columns of both input datasets.

trans-unit.source: If there are two columns with the same name in the input datasets, a numeric suffix is added to the name of the column from the dataset used in the right input column.
trans-unit.target: If there are two columns with the same name in the input datasets, a numeric suffix is added to the name of the column from the dataset used in the right input column.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two instances of a column named <legacyBold>TargetOutcome</legacyBold>, the right column would be renamed <legacyBold>TargetOutcome (1)</legacyBold>.
trans-unit.target: For example, if there are two instances of a column named <legacyBold>TargetOutcome</legacyBold>, the right column would be renamed <legacyBold>TargetOutcome (1)</legacyBold>.

trans-unit.source: For examples of how <ui>Add Columns</ui> is used in an experiment, see these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:
trans-unit.target: For examples of how <ui>Add Columns</ui> is used in an experiment, see these sample experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:

trans-unit.source: In the <externalLink><linkText>Customer relationship prediction</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525941</linkUri></externalLink> sample, a column that contains labels is combined with a feature dataset.
trans-unit.target: In the <externalLink><linkText>Customer relationship prediction</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525941</linkUri></externalLink> sample, a column that contains labels is combined with a feature dataset.

trans-unit.source: In the <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample, datasets that contain features are cleaned and then combined by using <link xlink:href="b2ebdabd-217d-4915-86cc-5b05972f7270" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Rows</link>, <ui>Add Columns</ui>, and <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Join</link>.
trans-unit.target: In the <externalLink><linkText>Breast cancer detection</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=525726</linkUri></externalLink> sample, datasets that contain features are cleaned and then combined by using <link xlink:href="b2ebdabd-217d-4915-86cc-5b05972f7270" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add Rows</link>, <ui>Add Columns</ui>, and <link xlink:href="124865f7-e901-4656-adac-f4cb08248099" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Join</link>.

trans-unit.source: For a list of all exceptions, see <link xlink:href="60822377-da7a-40b8-aec7-d185d1509344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Module Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For a list of all exceptions, see <link xlink:href="60822377-da7a-40b8-aec7-d185d1509344" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Module Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if one or more input datasets is null or empty.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if one or more input datasets is null or empty.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurs if one or more specified columns has a type that is unsupported by the current module.
trans-unit.target: An exception occurs if one or more specified columns has a type that is unsupported by the current module.
